relationships.description: Harry was tracked by Death Eaters, as mentioned in the conversation. Harry says 'And it doesn’t seem likely they were just strolling down Tottenham Court Road at the time, does it?' indicating that he believes the Death Eaters were tracking him.

Harry visited Tottenham Court Road, as mentioned in the conversation. Harry says 'only after we ran into a couple of Death Eaters in a café on Tottenham Court Road' indicating that he and his friends encountered Death Eaters at this location.

Lupin was tracked by Death Eaters, as mentioned in the conversation. Lupin says 'But how did they find you so quickly? It’s impossible to track anyone who Apparates, unless you grab hold of them as they disappear' indicating that he believes the Death Eaters were tracking him.
